ygData.subject: Weapon questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I was just curious what weapon/s other high level SK s like to use. I ve found that the DR is my weapon of choice, but I do switch to the FleshRipper when I m
ygData.messageBody:
I was just curious what weapon/s other high level SK's like to use. I've
found that the DR is my weapon of choice, but I do switch to the FleshRipper
when I'm not to concerned about the AE getting me killed (A DD spell would
have made this weapon so much nicer). Also lately I've found myself using a
Cryt. Sword and MM shield combo (just looks cool, with all the black and
silver plate). Any of you find any other weapons you like using (Thulian
claw, etc??)..

Enjoy...
